pageContext.course_type_long_description: Give your imagination a boost with tens of thousands of LEGO® parts! Build engineer-designed projects such as: Cities, Garbage Trucks, Catamarans, and Dinosaurs. Design and build as never before, and explore your craziest ideas in a supportive environment. There are no prerequisites for this course.
pageContext.course_type_name: Intro to STEM with LEGO® Materials, Winter
pageContext.action_url_comment: Registration for Summer Camps begins February 7, 2019. Register by May 10 for summer camps and SAVE $8! See the registration page for details.
